settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Customize the platform to your Preferences

validation.nameRequired: Please provide a name for shop

address.title: Address
address.description: The merchant wallet enables USDC acceptance for all businesses. It offers a secure and seamless way to manage revenue while minimizing merchant processing fees.

manage.title: Manage Wallet
manage.description: Manage USDC powered wallet by Circle

errors.usdcVerification: For USDC withdrawals, your account needs to be verified.
errors.contactSupport: Please contact Droplinked support at support@droplinked.com for verification.
errors.connectWalletFirst: Please connect a supported wallet first, then proceed with the withdrawal.

errors.walletNotFound: {{walletName}} extension not found. Please ensure the extension is installed and try again

storeName.title: Store Name
storeName.description: Enter the store's name that will appear on the landing page.

emailAddress.title: Email Address
emailAddress.description: Provide an email address to manage the account and receive updates.

customURL.title: Custom URL
customURL.description: Enter domain without "www." and then add the provided DNS details in domain settings.

success.urlSet: The entered URL has been set as your shop's custom URL

confirmModal.title: Add custom URL
confirmModal.description:
You are about to set "{{url}}" for your shop's custom URL. 
 Be aware that you will have to contact support to make changes. 
 Do you want to proceed?
confirmModal.yes: Yes, The entered URL is correct

address.title: Address
address.description: Provide the store or warehouse address for delivery and tax calculations.

success.created: Store address has been added successfully!

saveChanges.title: Settings have changed!
saveChanges.description: There are unsaved changes in the settings. Would you like to apply the new changes?

upgradePlan.premiumDescription: Designed for large businesses needing comprehensive solutions.
upgradePlan.proDescription: For small businesses and teams ready to grow.
upgradePlan.upgradeDescription:
You're almost there! This feature is available to premium account users.
Experience all the following features by upgrading today.

coupons.title: Coupons
coupons.description: Manage your discounts and coupons you want to give to users.

form.titleDescription: Enter a unique name for the discount.
form.amountDescription: Select the discount type between shop's currency or percentage.
form.quantityDescription: Number of times this discount can be used.
form.expirationDateDescription: Select a specific expiration date for discount.

validation.futureDateRequired: Expiry date must be in the future

credits.title: Credits
credits.description: Use credits to create discounts and coupons.

defaultLanguage.title: Default Store Language
defaultLanguage.description: Choose a preferred language across the platform. Users can change the language upon entering the store.

loginMethods.title: Login Methods
loginMethods.description: Allow customers to log in and connect from the following options to interact with the storefront.

ageGate.title: Age Gate
ageGate.description: Filter visitors based on setting a minimum age criteria to grant access to a storefront or particular products.

postPurchaseInfo.title: Post-Purchase Information
postPurchaseInfo.description: Create custom fields for collecting additional information after a customer makes a purchase.
postPurchaseInfo.placeholder: Add a note for your purchase

paymentProviders.title: Payment Providers
paymentProviders.description: Manage payment gateways and partnered services.

stripe.title: Stripe
stripe.tooltip: Connect a Stripe account to receive deposits directly into an existing account.

coinbase.title: Coinbase Commerce
coinbase.tooltip: The easy way to accept payments from around the world. Instant settlement, low fees, and broad support for over +200 digital assets.

paymob.title: Paymob
paymob.tooltip: Connect a Paymob account to receive deposits directly into an existing account.

paymentTokens.title: Payment Tokens
paymentTokens.description: Enable checkout payments for any native ERC20, BRC20 and SPL (Solana) based tokens.

walletRequirement.title: Wallet Requirement
walletRequirement.description: In order to receive native token payments with Tokenpay, you must connect an EVM or Solana based wallet. Otherwise, all received money will be converted to USD/USDC and applied to credits.

defaultCurrency.title: Default Currency
defaultCurrency.description: Choose a default currency to display to customers for products. During the checkout process, visitors will be able to see the total price in their local currency.

tokens.title: Tokens
tokens.description: Select token options you want to use for payments.
tokens.solanaTooltip: In order to receive direct token payments, you must connect a Solana wallet. If not, all received money will be converted to USD/USDC and applied to credits.

evmWallet.title: EVM Wallet
evmWallet.description: Connect one or multiple EVM-based wallets to accept Ethereum based digital assets. You can define percentage payouts across multiple wallet addresses.

solanaWallet.title: Solana Wallet
solanaWallet.description: Connect a Solana-based wallet in order to accept Solana based digital assets. You can define percentage payouts across multiple wallet addresses.

confidentialKey.title: Confidential Key
confidentialKey.description: Save the Private Key for secure access to store settings. Keep it safe, as it's crucial for the account's security.

domain.title: Domain
domain.description: Add a domain to generate a unique API key for secure store access.

deleteConfirmation.title: Delete Domain
deleteConfirmation.description: Are you sure you want to delete this Domain?
